alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 02 at 8:59AM CST until February 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Significant icing has occurred and additional light ice accumulations are possible until noon when temperatures are expected to rise above freezing and melting will occur. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Ashley and Chicot Counties. In Mississippi, Bolivar, Sunflower and Washington Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Damage to trees and power lines could result in power outages. Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
